TextBlock.Text: BETULA: Oryza had indicated that each planet would have a warp transmitter on the north pole that leads back to the orrery station, but I don't see one here.
ALNUS: I suppose she only said that most of the transmitters would be on the north pole, perhaps this one is somewhere else.
DAUCUS: That's irritating, lack of access to this planet's transmitter would make travel much more difficult.
